extendedInfo.description: Loved by the young at heart Ice cream sets the mood for everyone - be it those teeth-numbing Popsicles OR the other fruitilicious ice cream concoctions OR the classic chocolate chip. Remember how the popular anthem goes â I scream, You scream, We all scream for ICE-CREAM!!Dive into the world of ice cream with our new Ice-Cream Lovers Theme, for Active.Designed and developed by Active Lockscreen, This Theme will improve your Active Lockscreen by : â¢ Providing a pleasing visual experience while using Active Lockscreenâ¢ Supplying matching buttons, zippers and graphicsAlso ,The Active Lockscreen offers users many features and benefits : â¢ Fast and easy launch of any application â ideal when you are on the Goâ¢ Display your favorite gallery pictures, Facebook feeds and other apps of your choice while your phone is lockedâ¢ Set up shortcuts to any application you want or just let the appâs smart algorithm set your commonly used shortcuts for you â¢ Easy access with one clickâ¢ Reduce clicks to call a contact, launch an app, play a game, browse the web, play music, get Facebook updates or just unlock your phone â¢ Individual optimization to serve your needs (learns what you need from your previous actions) â¢ Set your favorite/recent contacts for easy calling even when you are on the goâ¢ Launch your recently used apps â¢ Send Text messages through your SMS Inbox or any other text app such as WhatsApp, Skype, Viber, Email, Gmail, Twitter or LinkedIn â¢ Launch the camera or any picture and graphics related apps installed on your phone such as Instagram, Mobli, Food, Adobe Photoshop ExpressThe Active Lockscreen is easy to use and is the best app for unlocking your phone.- all you need to do is place your finger on the lockscreen ring and drag it to the relevant action or shortcut.Enjoy our new background themes with matching graphics!
